posts.post_content:
These are specific cards I've sold in the past that I would like to purchase back if you happen to have them and want to sell them.

I am also interested in any perfectly centered and registered portraits. Backs are not important to me, only clean fronts.

[url]trae@t206.org[/url]

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/devlin70_copy.jpg[/IMG]

Old Mill Chance
[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/chance.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/dessau.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/shclafly.jpg[/IMG]

Bumpski. :)

Looking to buy any perfectly centered and focused T206 portraits!
Sorry Trae, didn't realize I bumped you off so soon after your post.

Trae,

I have about 35 - 40 T206 cards listed for sale in PSA 4 or SGC 50.   A hand-full or so have exceptional centering.    Feel free to have a look if you are so inclined.

Here's the link...

[url]http://cassidyssportscards.webs.com/t20619091911.htm[/url]
I appreciate that. I didn't see anything that I wanted this time but I'll bookmark your site and keep an eye-out. Thanks

Trae:
I have a number of portraits going up for sale shortly, I can send you a full list tonight and I'll send you scans of any you want to see. I'll only list the nicer ones, I probably have about 50 I'll be putting up for sale.  Let me know, thanks


Doug

[url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url]
Doug, I would be very grateful to have a first crack. Thanks!

I am also interested in any perfectly centered and registered portraits. 

they are a thing of beauty! good luck trae.

Andy, if you like I'll send you the scans of any Trae is not interested in, please let me know, thanks

Doug
Doug thanks for the opportunity and pleasant transaction. I owe you one! :)
